Interface ScrabbleView

All Known Implementing Classes:
ScrabbleGUI, ScrabbleModelTest.MockView
public interface ScrabbleView
Abstract View interface for the Scrabble game in MVC pattern. It defines the contract that all view implementations have to follow. Views are notified by the model when a state changes as the Observer Pattern.

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update()
      Updates the view so that it shows the current model state. It is called by the model when a state changes.

    • handleAIPlay

      void handleAIPlay(String playerName, String word, int points, int totalPoints)
      Have views do something to describe the AI's turn and word
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the (AI) player
      word - The word that was played by the AI
      points - The amount of points the word played was worth
      totalPoints - The AI player's total score after playing the word

    • handleAISwap

      void handleAISwap(String playerName, String tiles)
      Have views do something to listing the tiles the AI swapped
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the (AI) player
      tiles - The tiles the AI placed in the bag

    • handleAIPass

      void handleAIPass(String playerName)
      Have views do something to state that the AI has passed
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the (AI) player
